resources.string:
DevOPS Society Has Been Designed Solely To Create Job Connections and Enhancement of Skills to Those Members With Agile Skills In One Or More Of The Following Sections Of Computing:


1.Software Engineering And Technics
 
2.Linux Guy And Reverse Engineering
 
3.Cyber Security And Computer Forensics
 
4.Networks Engineering
 
5.Database and Wizards
 
6.Web Development Technics
 
7.Machine Learning And Artificial Intelligence (A.I)
 
 

	 A Brief Overview; 
1.DevOps->Developers Society (Kenya Based)
 
2.Achievement is Going To Be Done By Bringing Up Together The Enthusiastic Upcoming Developers And Already Being Developers From Different Angles Of The Country To Be Working Together In Sharing Ideas And Clarification Of Common Errors Among Developers.
 
3.Also Most Of The Students With Panasonic Skills In Computing After Graduating From Universities and Colleges End Up Wasting Time In Search Of Jobs, Here DevOPS Will Deal With The Issue With No Remorse To Its Maximum Capability So That Such Students Gets Their Place(s) Of Interest Majestically By Marketing Skills They Having In Works.
 
4.Become A Developers Society Member Officially And Enjoy Reality of Your Royalties !.
 
Are You Interested In Joining This Society To Elevate Your Skills and Have A Possibility Of Securing Job In Kenya?.


powered by:
ShimitaDouglas@MasenoUniversity

resources.string:
DevOps Society Kenya,Is An Application,Platform and A Foundation Which Has Been Developed By A Student From Maseno University With The Sole Purpose Of Enabling All Students Who Have Valid Dreams In Any Field Of Computing To Achieve Them. 

There Are Two Sections Of Using This Application. 
1,The Offline Mode Which,Is Only Available When One Selects The Quick View Or The OverView Menu.With This Mode Some Functionalities Are limited. 

2,The Online Mode Which,Requires One To Be Connected To The Internet For Registration Of Account With The DevOPs Society If He or She Doesn't Have The Account. 

If One Owns An Account Then He or She Is required To Login Using The Valid Account Credentials.In case of Password Recovery,One Is Required To Contact the Administrator @ DevOps Society By Means Provided On the Platform, For Security Reasons. 

Once One Is Logged In Some Features will Automatically be Rendered In Offline Mode While One is Still Logged In Their Respective Account,This Will Ensure That No extra Internet Data Is Surcharged To The Members,Since DevOps Society Cares For Them. 

Active Members In The Society will Be,Their Privileges Raised To Administrative Roles In Such A Way That They Will Be Able To Work On Jobs Posted By Clients From Different places For Payment Lucratively With No Delay To Their M-PESA Accounts,Managing DevOps Members Account And Other More Essential Roles @DevOPs. 

New Members In The Society Will Gain Unique And On Point Computing Study Materials,And That,Will Be Their Hands Held By The Professionals @DevOps to Ensure That They Too Shine Brighter Than Before Their Enrollment Into The Society.
From There,They Will Also Be Given Administrative Roles @DevOPs. 

Post A Job Menu Is For Any Member Who Has Come Across A Job and Feels Like He Or She Can Repost It On To The Platform So That Any Member Who Have Computerised Skills Of Solving It Can Work On It Right On The Spot.
If The Job Is Done Successfully,The One Posted The Job Will be Given Some Earnings For Motivational Spirit. 

With The Menu Get A Job For You,One Will Be Able To Work With The Job that Suits His Her Capability. 
NOTE,Post A Job And Get A Job Menu Works Only Online. 

Lastly,There is A DevOps Forum Which Is Available from the Main Menu Which Ensures That Members In Need Of Clarifications In Software,Networking,Database,Web Development,Hacking Techniques And Many More In The World Of Computing Gets Clarified.
Server Is Down, Try Again Later!

Adhere To The Guidelines Below Which Have Been Well Stipulated In Cut And Dry:

 1.Use Of DevOps Products Such As Its Softwares Is For Educational Purposes Only.A User With Malicious Reasons Will Their Accounts Be Disabled Or If Possible Deleted Permanently.

 2.On Payment Of Non-Refundable Fee OF Ksh.100 For Account Upgrade,The User Should Be Aware That The Amount Is Non-Refundable.

 3.If It Happens That The User Attempted Stratagems(M-Pesa Reversal) During The Payment Of The Fee For Account Upgrade To A Super User. If Found, The victims Account Will Be Permanently Deleted.

 4.DevOps Society Cares For Your Security And Advices That You Are ALso Responsible For Your Account Security When It Comes To Credentials Like The Passwords.

 5.Only Members With Super User Account Will Be Able To Access Most Of The Functionalities and The Bests Of Best Provided By The DevOps Society Kenya.
Connect To The Internet In Order To Browse Online With Our Most Secured Browser.Data Bundles or Wifi Connection Is Required For Things To Work!

Buy Supporting The Developer, He Will Be Greatly Appreciated And Motivated and keep Him Continuously On The Glowing When It comes To The Matters To Do With Software Production In This Modernity World Of Computing. Also You Are Very Welcomed When It Comes To Joining The DevOps Society Team, Where We Share Knowledge And Implement The Little We Are Having And Make It Bulge By Expounding The Ideas To More Reality From the Virtual World Of Simulation.

resources.string:
Dear Member Requiring To Undergo Registration Process Provided On This Platform;
 You Are Required To Provide Genuine Registration Information Which Will Be For Your Own Benefit @DevOps Society Kenya.

 Your Information Will Not Be Shared To Any Third Party Applications Or Organisations Since Your Account Details Will Become Compromised When Lands On Unauthorised Personnel.

 Once Your registration Is a Success,You will Become One Of The Invincible Guys In I.T Field Since,You will Be Provided With Unbreakable Connection To Very Proficient Guys In Different Fields Of Computing Such As CyberSecurity and Hacking Techniques,Software Engineering World,Computer Networks Engineering, Machine Learning And Artificial Intelligence,Computer Virus and AntiVirus Techniques,Systems Administration,Database Wizards World,Web Design and Development Tricks.

 You Are Only Required To Select the Field That Makes You Feel Cozy Whenever You Got a Laptop On Your Laps Or Desktop Computer On A StandBy Anchor. Join The Society And Let Us Think With The Technology and Leave Theories Aside By implementing Them Properly!. Begin Your Registration By Clicking The Button Provided Below.

Dear User In This Section,You Are Only Allowed To Login Into A particular Account; A Valid Account If and Only If You Have Valid Account Credentials.If This Is Not The Case,Then You Will Encounter Login Access Denial !.\n \n If You Do Not Have An Account Connected To Developers Society Kenya, Then Create One From Any Menu That Contains A Label Create Account Provided In This Application\'s Menu.

Understand The Well Written Privacy and Policy Terms Highlighted Below:

 1.DevOps Society Kenya ("we","us" or "our") Operates DevOps Society Mobile Application.
 
2.By Accepting The Use Of DevOps Services You Agree To The Collection And Use Of Information In AccordanceWith Our Policies.
 
3.Violation Of Any Policy May Render The Application Useless To The User And If the Violation Is A Heightened,The User's Account May Become Terminated From The DevOps Society.

 
 	 	 	 	 Information Collection And Use
 
 .We Collect User's Information During The Registration Process In Order To Improve The service(s) Delivered To The User When The Application Begins Its Official Functions.Therefore,A User With Faulty Credentials Will Be His/Her Services Faulty Too,Which Is Not Recommended!.(Garbage In Garbage Out GIGO).
 
.DevOps Society Has The Mandate To Remove Such Accounts (faulty) If Any Found.

 
 	 	 	 	 Security Of The Information
 
.The Security Of Your Data Is Important To Us,Since It's One Of The Main Objective Of Our Society To Existence.While We Strive To Use Commercially Acceptable Means To Protect Your Personal Data,We Cannot Guarantee Its Absolute Security During Electronic Transmission To And Fro,Therefore It'sBest Advised That The User Too Adhere To The Guidelines Of Securing Sensitive Data Such As Account PasswordsBy Entering The Minimum Recommended Characters, Than A Weak Password.

 
 	 	 	 	 Accounts And Types Offered
 
.DevOps Society Offers Two Types Of Account From Which The User Will Opt The One Suits Him/Her:
 
.Super Account Also Called Premium Account And Normal Account.
 
.With The Premium Account The User Has Absolute Privileges Provided By the Society i.e;Unlock Of Very Key Concepts Of Programming Languages,Direct Link To Professional Stars In The Society,Direct Link To Clients Requesting Particular Services,Marketing And Advertisement Of The User Projects,Ideas,Apps etc.
 
.Normal Account Is the standard Account Provided By The Society,It Works fine But With Limited Functionalities in Relation To The super Account.
 
.One Can Own A Premium Account On Payment Of Non-Refundable Fee Of Ksh.100 To The Developer During The Registration Process When He/She Selects The Super account Option, Or Later By Upgrade After Registering With Normal Account.
 NOTE The Amount Is Currently Offered As A Promotion And May Vary With Time,Its Better To Grab The Offer Currently On Promotion.

 
 	 	 	 	 Change To This Privacy Policy
 
.We May Update Our Privacy and Policy From Time To Time,If Changes Occur We Will Notify You Through Notifications So That You Stay Updated.

 
 	 	 	 	 Contact Us
 
 Telephone :+254757450727
 

Email :shimitadouglas@gmail.com,
 
 Email2: tranzeer@gmail.com
 

Github : Freshman483
 

LinkedIn :Shimita Douglas

Rate Application is currently Unavailable With The Sole Reason Being That It Is Under Maintenance by the Software Technicians At Developers Society Kenya. You Will Be Notified When The Service Is Back.\n\nYou May Encounter Some Scenarios Like This One While Using This Application Please, Do Not Become Dismayed All Is Well At DevOps Society, We Working On Such Issues And We Are Going To Sort Out These Issues As Soon As Possible,Thank You For Making Installation Of Our Society Application More Goodies Is On Coming,Stay Connected.
The Page You Have Selected Is Currently Not Updated From The Developer, When It Becomes Updated You Will Be Notified On its Update.Stay Linked With Developers Society Kenya, Thank You.
Post A Service To The Users

Exit With Signing Me Out
 
you will be exited from your currently logged account and get signed out. therefore you will be required to login again in order to access your account profile again. 

Exit Without Signing Me Out
 
you will be exited from your currently logged account without being signed out. hence you will have not to sign in again unless administrative rules about account security drives in; you may be prompted to select your choice on the re-lunching of the application if you want to access you account or not. 

None Of The Above
 
you will be forwarded back to your main profile
